item.description:
Next meeting will be Tuesday, December 20th (not Thursday) at 7 PM. 

I'd like to talk about Electromagnetic Pulsing Pads and see if anyone has used one and what it's effects have been.  I've been reading about them and then recently Dr. Oz did a 20 minute spread on this technology and it's miraculous effect on chronic pain.

I will bring my pain patches, inflammation patches and healing Carnosine patches if anyone wants to try them.  Just let me know ahead of time so I can come early and "patch" those interested.

I will also bring my laser if anyone has an interest in experiencing this technology as well. Again let me know in advance so I can schedule you for 6 minutes or so.

Bring any XMAS goodies you might like to taste.  I'll probably bring something from my mother's bakery stash which is always amazing this time of year.

Hope to see you all.

 

Betsy
item.how_to_find_us: Upstairs. There is an elevator on the right as you come in on the first level
item.name: Time for our meetup
